The following symbol is supposed to be a left double quotation mark (Hex UTF-8 bytes 0xE2 0x80 0x9C): â€œ

The detection fails on Firefox with Apache 2 serving the file and the symbol is rendered incorrectly. Works on Chrome and WebKit2

Firefox, chrome and WebKit all fail to detect that this is an XHTML file due to the wrong mimetype being sent by the webserver (due to the wrong file extension).
